summary:
Chiel is a real team player who works in a service-oriented way and who thinks along with that, is ready and has respect for the interests of the customer. He has a great sense of responsibility and is highly motivated in his work. Using his open attitude he is able to convey his enthusiasm to others. Chiel is very involved and gladly helps the customer or his colleagues with advice or a solution. Chiel stands for quality and is someone you can build on!

Over the years, Chiel has developed as a t-shaped Software Engineer and can be employed as a tester and/or a developer with experience in both traditional waterfall and Agile Scrum projects. These projects were both small scale and more complex projects with various cultures, suppliers and offshore partners.

At home Chiel likes to be among people and he is often on the road or busy with all kind of things. He likes to do fun things with his family as a proud father and husband or converses with friends. He enjoys being a handyman at home by renovating or creating new things, likes photography, flying with his drone, creating websites and he enjoys cycling his racing bike or play golf.

certifications.name: Oracle PL/SQL en de procedurele extensie opfriscursus

courses.name: 2004 (E-business) basic training, Sogeti + USA Ohio State University
2007 extensive course for starting Test Coordinators: wide scope with different training courses
2017 Oracle Database 11G: PL/SQL Advanced collections and objects

profile_positions.description:
Next to his development activities Chiel is mainly responsible for maintaining and executing integration and regression test activities for the payment processing application WAY4. This back office application is responsible for processing an average of 8 million transactions a day. WAY4 is a Custom Of The Shelf (COTS) application which as a base is delivered by an international supplier. The internal organization acts as the client. 

The objective here is to guarantee the operation of the entire chain and to demonstrate that non-modified parts of the application continue to work as expected, both manually and automated.

Chiel is working within an international team, working according to the agile method, which is extended with an offshore partner in Armenia. The combination with the external supplier from Russia makes it a complex and challenging environment.

In addition, Chiel has a chain responsibility for the integration and chain tests and is therefore part of an overarching virtual integration test team.

Characteristics:
Agile SCRUM
Regression testing
Itegration testing
JIRA
Confluence (Atlassian)
Jenkins
Subversion
profile_positions.title: Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Combined with his role in the Automation team Chiel is also responsible for developing functionality and maintain customization's on the payment processing application WAY4. This back office application is responsible for processing an average of 8 million transactions a day. WAY4 is a Custom Of The Shelf (COTS) application which as a base is delivered by an international supplier. The internal organization acts as the client. Implementation examples: JCB and UP, Payment Models, CashBack, ECOM-MOTO, dynamic currency conversion, multi-currency.
	
Chiel is also responsible for developing and maintaining multiple VBA and .NET support applications/tools.   

Chiel is working within an international team, working 	according to the agile method, which is extended with an offshore partner in Armenia. The combination with the external supplier from Russia makes it a complex and challenging environment.

Because of his experience as a Test Engineer, Chiel is also regularly used as an additional test resource. He is responsible for the preparation and execution of functional and technical acceptance tests, regression tests, interface tests and chain tests.

Characteristics:
Agile Scrum
Oracle
PL/SQL
VBA
JIRA /Quality Center (QC)
Confluence (Atlassian)
Jenkins
Subversion
profile_positions.title: Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
To be able to demonstrate consistent quality, we recognize various automated test lines within the organization in which the entire transaction processing and clearing and settlement are guaranteed. The ultimate goal is to run chain test(s) on a Production clone before releases are taken into production, including automated checks at every level.

With his knowledge about the back office application for the transaction processing, Chiel is assigned to this team. His role is to maintain this part of the chain, to support the chain tests and to develop functionality for automating these test lines. For this the development language Python is used in combination with robot framework.

Characteristics:
Agile SCRUM
Python
Robot Framework
JIRA
profile_positions.title: Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Translating the wish of Human Resource Management (HRM) as internal customer to a set of MS Access / VBA support tools. Based on interviews and demos and rapidly changing requirements, Chiel was responsible for the design, development, testing and implementation of:

Appraisal Monitor:
Read and enrich all Equens approval forms before storing them in a Access database and compare them automatically with the Oracle occupation list. The final result was an HRM report based on which evaluations were implemented. In addition, writing a work instruction.

Statistic Monitor:
Read and enrich data based on the Oracle Occupation List resulting in an Excel report. In addition, writing a work instruction.
profile_positions.title: Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Payment processing application WAY4:
Organizing and executing an System Test (test strategy, work instructions and test scripts) for the payment processing application WAY4 which is responsible for processing an average of 8 million transactions a day. The application is Custom Of The Shelf (COTS) which as a base is delivered by an international supplier. 

Other responsibilities are organizing and executing the delivery process together with the supplier and developing test support tools. Chiel is also involved in the incident process (internal organization and supplier) and the Software Impact Analysis review process.

Contract Management application:
Organizing and structuring a System Test (test strategy, test scripts) and a Regression Test, execution of System and Integration Tests and coordinating test activities of the developers.
profile_positions.title: Software Engineer

profile_positions.description: Within Art of Testing, Chiel works as a test consultant / test coordinator. Due to a deteriorated ICT market, he is available for a longer period of time for a new assignment / customer. During his availability, Chiel was involved in various internal projects.
profile_positions.title: Senior Testcoördinator

profile_positions.description:
In his role as Test Coordinator, Chiel is seconded to the customer Delta Lloyd.
Web application ePensioen light. Test coordination for a team of 2 testers: guard and maintain test process based on the Master Test Plan (MTP), planning, workload/capacity management, defect management and reporting to the client. Preparing and executing Acceptance Tests (FAT) and/or Chain and Performance Test, in case of a high test capacity demand.
profile_positions.title: Testcoördinator

profile_positions.description:
In his role as Test Coordinator / Test Engineer, Chiel is seconded to the customers Schuitema NV.
Migration of multiple platforms. Test coordination for a team of 3 testers. Document and maintain the test strategy in the test plan, workload management and reporting to the client. Preparing and executing Acceptance Tests in case of a high test capacity demand.
profile_positions.title: Testcoördinator

profile_positions.description:
